apple.cocoatouch.ui

类 UIView

  • java.lang.Object
    • apple.cocoatouch.foundation.NSObject
      • apple.cocoatouch.ui.UIResponder
        • apple.cocoatouch.ui.UIView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CocoaTouchView.Delegate
    直接已知子类:
    UIActionSheet, UIAlertView, UIControl, UIImageView, UILabel, UINavigationBar, UIScrollView, UITableView, UITableViewCell, UITextView, UIWebView, UIWindow

    public class UIView
extends UIResponder
implements CocoaTouchView.Delegate
